p: The overall fragments sugar content was assessed by acid hydrolysis as previously described [ 33]. Samples collected after 0 h, 15 h and 96 h of enzymatic hydrolysis were milled to a granulometry of 80 µm and then submitted to a two-step H 2SO 4 hydrolysis: 125 µL of a 12M H 2SO 4 solution was added to 10 mg of biomass samples for 2 h at room temperature under stirring, then acid was diluted to 1 M for another 2-h incubation at 100 °C. Hydrolysed monomeric sugars were quantified by HPAEC–PAD [ 13].
